addTextChunk

Source: R/utilities-writing-report.R
addTextChunk.Rd

Add a text chunk to a .md document

addTextChunk(fileName, text, logFolder = getwd())

Arguments

fileName

name of .md file
text

text to include in the document
logFolder

folder where the logs are saved

See also

Other reporting: addFigureChunk(), addTableChunk(), anchor(), copyReport(), getAnchorName(), hasAnchor(), mergeMarkdownFiles(), renderReport(), renderWordReport(), resetReport()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
resetReport("report.md")
addTextChunk(fileName = "report.md", text = "new text")
}
